biocontainers.name: orfm
biocontainers.summary: OrfM is a simple and not slow ORF caller

biotools.summary: A simple and not slow open reading frame (ORF) caller. No bells or whistles like frameshift detection, just a straightforward goal of returning a FASTA file of open reading frames over a certain length from a FASTA/Q file of nucleotide sequences.

bioschemas.name: orfm
bioschemas.summary: A simple and not slow open reading frame (ORF) caller. No bells or whistles like frameshift detection, just a straightforward goal of returning a FASTA file of open reading frames over a certain length from a FASTA/Q file of nucleotide sequences.
